attributes.action: Kindly Issue orders to Release the 10 Pakistani Students Still Detained under no Charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After Court hearing ending up with no evidence to prove those guilty, the 10 Pakistani students are still detained in prison. This has created enough trauma already for their poor parents sufferings every day and night. While causing deep concerns  for the Pakistani community about the Law enforcing bodies of UK.
The students were not allowed to continue their studies while their career has been put under a hanging axe.

We believe it is an affront to justice and human rights to be detained without charge. We demand their Immediate release with respect and apologies by the concernd authorities who have been unsuccessful to prove those guilty.
